==== FAA2UK Model ====
Out of the box the following keys do not work (Produced unknown key pressed in /var/log/messages )

* Battery Meter (Fn+F2)
* Euro Symbol (Fn + F3) AltGr + 4 produces a â‚¬
* Swap Displays did not swap between laptop and external monitor (Fn + F4)
* The Brightness Controls (Fn + Up Arrow/Down Arrow)
* The Wireless LAN toggle (Fn + F9)
* Brightness / Contrast display Fn + F5

WiFi did not work out of box. Network manager showed list of available networks but did not associate. Solved by adding

<pre>
wpa-scan-ssid 1
wpa-ap-scan 1
</pre>
to /etc/network/interfaces. See http://wiki.debian.org/iwlwifi
